Package net.truelicense.api.auth

Provides authentication services.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Authentication
    Provides authentication services.
    AuthenticationParameters
    Defines parameters for accessing a KeyStore which holds the public or private keys to sign or verify an artifact using an Authentication.
    AuthenticationProvider
    Provides an authentication.
    RepositoryContext<Model>
    A factory for repository models and their associated repository controllers.
    RepositoryContextProvider<Model>
    Provides a repository context.
    RepositoryController
    A controller for storing authenticated objects (artifacts) in a generic repository model.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RepositoryIntegrityException
    Indicates that the integrity of a repository has probably been compromised because the public key did not match the private key when verifying its encoded artifact.

Package net.truelicense.api.auth Description

Provides authentication services.
Author:
Christian Schlichtherle
